description:
### 12.5 erosion_opencl

Apply erosion effect to the video.

This filter replaces the pixel by the local(3x3) minimum.

It accepts the following options:

**threshold0**

**threshold1**

**threshold2**

**threshold3**

    Limit the maximum change for each plane. Range is [0, 65535] and default value is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged. 

**coordinates**

    Flag which specifies the pixel to refer to. Range is [0, 255] and default value is 255, i.e. all eight pixels are used. Flags to local 3x3 coordinates region centered on x: 1 2 3 4 x 5 6 7 8
name: erosion_opencl

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane. Range is [0, 65535] and default value is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
options.name: threshold0

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane. Range is [0, 65535] and default value is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
options.name: threshold1

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane. Range is [0, 65535] and default value is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
options.name: threshold2

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane. Range is [0, 65535] and default value is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
options.name: threshold3

options.description:
Flag which specifies the pixel to refer to. Range is [0, 255] and default value is 255, i.e. all eight pixels are used.

Flags to local 3x3 coordinates region centered on x:

1 2 3

4 x 5

6 7 8
options.name: coordinates
